meanings.definition: Of or relating to a unit of length equal to ten meters.
meanings.sent1: The decametric rope was used to measure the field.
meanings.sent2: The decametric ruler is perfect for measuring large distances.
meanings.sent3: The decametric tape measure decided to take a break after a long day of measuring.
meanings.sent4: Her strides were as long as decametric units, covering the ground quickly.
meanings.sent5: The decametric flag fluttered proudly in the wind, marking the finish line.

meanings.sent1: The decametric pole vault event was exciting to watch.
meanings.sent2: The decametric bridge spanned the river, connecting the two banks.
meanings.sent3: The decametric scarf was so long, it wrapped around her multiple times.
meanings.sent4: His decametric strides made him the fastest runner on the track.
meanings.sent5: The decametric snake slithered gracefully through the grass, its length impressive.
